import React, { useState } from 'react'; const AddRecipeForm = () => { const [formData, setFormdata] = useState({ title: '', subtitle: '', category: '', pt1: 'MALT/GRAIN BILL', pb1: '', pt2: 'HOPS/SCHEDULE', pb2: '', pt3: 'YEAST', pb3: '', pt4: 'DIRECTIONS', pb4: '' }) const { title, subtitle, category, paragraphs } = formData; const onChange = (e) => { console.log(paragraphs[0].pt); setFormdata({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: [e.target.value] }) } return (
